rationale: 'sizeable' modifies 'cases' (a noun). 'biggest' modifies 'one' (a pronoun referring to cases).
statement_text: This week, there have also been sizeable bird flu cases confirmed on farms in Minnesota, Maryland, South Dakota, Wisconsin, Georgia and California. But the biggest one of those cases [confirmed bird flu cases] was the Maryland chicken farm where 198,200 birds were killed.
